reasonsList.title: Not a dry theory
reasonsList.description: Our curriculum is designed to provide practical, real-world knowledge that you can immediately apply to your projects and career

reasonsList.title: Tasks from real life
reasonsList.description: We do not create abstract tasks, but take concrete tasks that a developer faces when working with clients, and that await the programmer in the future

reasonsList.title: Always Up-to-Date
reasonsList.description: Our course content is continuously updated to ensure you stay ahead of the curve, with the latest industry trends and best practices

reasonsList.title: Practical video examples
reasonsList.description: You will have videos with practical tasks and explanations that you can complete on your own

reasonsList.title: our courses are structured in stages
reasonsList.description: You will learn everything step by step topic by topic, in the process of learning new topics you will learn topics that you have already studied
